body_html:
@fehiepsi what exactly is the error message you're getting? I'm getting the following on master, and want to make sure you have the same problem:

>>> import torch
>>>
>>> u = torch.zeros((3, 3), requires_grad=True)
>>> v = u.permute(-1, -2)  # (1, 0) here is fine
>>> v.sum().backward()
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
  File "/Users/rzou/pytorch/pytorch/torch/autograd/variable.py", line 120, in bac
kward
    torch.autograd.backward(self, gradient, retain_graph, create_graph)
  File "/Users/rzou/pytorch/pytorch/torch/autograd/__init__.py", line 87, in back
ward
    tensors, grad_tensors, retain_graph, create_graph)
RuntimeError: repeated dim in permute

body:
@fehiepsi what exactly is the error message you're getting? I'm getting the following on master, and want to make sure you have the same problem:
```
>>> import torch
>>>
>>> u = torch.zeros((3, 3), requires_grad=True)
>>> v = u.permute(-1, -2)  # (1, 0) here is fine
>>> v.sum().backward()
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
  File "/Users/rzou/pytorch/pytorch/torch/autograd/variable.py", line 120, in bac
kward
    torch.autograd.backward(self, gradient, retain_graph, create_graph)
  File "/Users/rzou/pytorch/pytorch/torch/autograd/__init__.py", line 87, in back
ward
    tensors, grad_tensors, retain_graph, create_graph)
RuntimeError: repeated dim in permute
```
